title: What are the best examples of responsibility? - Quora

response.answer_text: Question number 4,692 that tempts me to believe that Quora is at least partially populated by people raised by wolves in the forest. re·spon·si·bil·i·ty rəˌspänsəˈbilədē/ noun the state or fact of having a duty to deal with something or of having control over someone.synonyms:authority, control, power, leadership"a job with greater responsibility"the state or fact of being accountable or to blame for something."the group has claimed responsibility for a string of murders"synonyms:blame, fault, guilt, culpability, liability"they denied responsibility for the bomb attack"the opportunity or ability to act independently and make decisions without authorization."we would expect individuals lower down the organization to take on more responsibility"Here are some examples: The responsibility to pay for a meal you ordered in a restaurant.The responsibility to impeach Trump.The responsibility to raise children you fathered or at least pay for their upkeep.The responsibility to remove Trump from office under Article 25 of the Constitution.The responsibility to file an income tax return each year.The responsibility to vote for candidates who will return control of Congress to the Democrats this year and impeach Trump.The responsibility to file accurate and honest time sheets and expense reports at work.The responsibility to urge your Congressman to oppose Trump’s threat to shut down the government if his border wall is not funded.The responsibility to remain seated at the movies, if you’re sitting in front of me, when the credits roll, or, if you must stand, move out of the way.The responsibility to oppose every measure supported by Trump.I trust this makes the matter clear.

In my life time I have seen and took different types of best responsibilities !!  Father and Mother: Meaning of everything in the world starts from them.Responsibility wih Love..Live with responsibility in all aspects of growing and caring their kids  and taking all good steps to  prolong their family in the most honourable way in society! They take responsibility for each other and further for their offspring and the Family ..In this responsibility they learn ,act,suffer what not almost all intangible feelings ..In this process they enhance their knowledge and share wisdom ! Siblings: They care for each other and take the responsibility of others in many things. Elder and Younger both will be taking responsibility towards the other ! That's the magic of blood relation !!! Some aspects we cannot share or ask to parents and this role is always played by sibling ! The very next responsibility I have seen is in Sibling.. Teacher: The other aspect of life's responsibility is taken by Teacher! They teach many things which can give a great confidence to take a step forward in our life.Responsibility of sharing Information Knowledge Wisdom is taken by a Teacher (Guru). I have very great respect towards my Teachers and off course parents are always plays a Teacher role even ! Friend: Ther is a saying A friend in need is a friend indeed! Parents are also friends.People we meet in schools,collegess,office will become friends to us.  We enjoyWe fightWe studyWe love and live We care for each otherWe share everything We help each otherWhat not ?? We do all stupid crazy things together !More over we take responsibility for each other ! Manager and Colleagues: Even in this phase people take responsibility for us and our work along with their work. Although their main priority is their work but still they take responsibility of us in helping things which are unknown to us and helps us to grow our career.. As a family member : We always take care of our Family!! Helping our parents in all the ways we can. Taking all responsibilies of our family when we are grown up. Even we take care of our siblings in their studies and what not! Taking responsibility of soulmate and letting everyone happy is the greatest ever responsibility we take in our lives!! As a Student: We take responsibility to gain knowledge and study properly for bright career which makes everyone happy.Taking study responsibilities along with social responsibility. Many responsibilities like technical , non technical , cultural, sports , administrative, sports etc we take in our student life. Enhancement always happens !! As an Employee: We always take the responsibility of work assigned to us . Should maintain quality in our work and always get respect with our responsible nature. Render many responsible services!! Social responsibility:  It's not always act of earning it's always a responsibility to help others who are in need ! I personally feel life always prolongs with many responsibilities and responsibility is not a duty always .. It encompasses all sorts of lively things which helps us and gives happiness !! Always be responsible for what you have done !And every responsibility is THE BEST !!
